subject: Re: [[junit] Any Ideas ?]
msgSnippet: Sure ! i will share with you guys ! this error [junit] Could not invoke the suite() method was occured, is due to it couldn t find where is the suite()
messageBody:
Sure ! i will share with you guys !

this error "[junit] Could not invoke the suite() method" was occured, is due to it couldn't find where is the suite() method ! This can be solved by checking the path setting in the web.xml, especially the when you call the TestRunner to invoke the test. Make sure the TestRunner would be able to find the class with suite() method.

I hope it helps ! :-)

cheers,
selena
 
 
 
 

"Herrick, Chuck" wrote:

 

you might consider telling everyone what solved the problem so they can avoid this problem in the future.

    Subject:        Re: [[junit] Any Ideas ?]

    ths, is solved now...

    -selena
